floater.floater.string: 你的方位是 [POSITION_LOCAL_0,number,1], [POSITION_LOCAL_1,number,1], [POSITION_LOCAL_2,number,1]，地區名：[REGION]，主機：<nolink>[HOSTNAME]</nolink> ([HOSTIP]) SLURL: <nolink>[SLURL]</nolink> (全球坐標 [POSITION_0,number,1], [POSITION_1,number,1], [POSITION_2,number,1]) [SERVER_VERSION] [[SERVER_RELEASE_NOTES_URL] [ReleaseNotes]]
